summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 4639 lux), and cloud levels (up 564 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1494 m), light levels (up 6935 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 563.7m lower than yesterday, 1059.5m lower than past week, 1493.6m lower than past month.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 860m to 3110m and averaged 1309.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air. Drizzle or light rain possible, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and a mix of sun and clouds. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
